message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $1300000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. However, I need to ensure I get a fair deal for the product. Considering its value to you is $1500000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My new offer is $1350000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1250000. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1300000. That's the minimum I can accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to ensure I get a fair deal. My new offer is $1325000. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1225000. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm starting to get concerned that we might not meet in the middle. Considering the product's value to you is $1500000, I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession. My new offer is $1300000, and I'm willing to throw in some additional perks to sweeten the deal. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1200000. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one last concession. Considering the product's value to you is $1500000, I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, but I need you to throw in some additional value to make it worth my while. I'm thinking a 5-year warranty and a maintenance package would be a good starting point. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1200000, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1150000, and I'll throw in a 5-year warranty and maintenance package as you suggested. Can you consider that?
